mapper.insert: INSERT INTO wish_list VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(wno)+1,1) FROM wish_list), #{cno},#{cate},#{id},SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM wish_list WHERE cno=#{cno} AND cate=#{cate} AND id=#{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wish_list WHERE cno=#{cno} AND cate=#{cate} AND id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT wno,cno,regdate,h.hno,h.name,h.image FROM wish_list w, hall h WHERE w.cno=h.hno AND id=#{id} ORDER BY wno DESC
